thread.title: So Long, Hong Kong: Chinese Investors Sell Stocks at Record Pace

author: Joanne Chiu
title: So Long, Hong Kong: Chinese Investors Sell Stocks at Record Pace
text: Chinese investors pulled out of Hong Kong stocks this month at the fastest pace since markets in Shanghai and the city were linked in 2014. April saw 8.1 billion Hong Kong dollars ($1.03 billion) more in sales of Hong Kong-listed equities than in purchases through the Stock Connect systems between the financial center and exchanges WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: 3%, Dollar King, Living in a Van Next Trump's Shifting Iran Rhetoric Jolts Oil Marketâ€”Energy Journal
